title: Commission Tracking System
requirement:
Implement a reliable commission tracking system that calculates accurately and synchronizes with payment processing in real time, providing comprehensive reporting and insights.  
#### Screens:  
Dashboard for viewing and managing commission reports, settings for configuring commission rates, and real-time alerts page.  
#### Personas:  
Menu.ca owners who need to track revenue, financial team members responsible for reporting, and system administrators managing integration settings.
